content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the cuddle up dinosaur blanket features the corner to corner stitch and a roaring good time crochet one for your own little wild one with this crochet pattern on moogly with this pattern it s all too easy to see the possibilities change up the colors and you ll go from dino to cuddle up dragon blanket change up the spike colors use color-changing yarn your imagination is the limit and it s a great accompaniment to the cuddle up unicorn blanket i used the corner to corner or c2c stitch aka the box stitch to create most of the pieces for this design but if you re not a fan don t fret you can simply make the body and head with simple row of double_crochet or your own chosen stitch just work to the dimensions for each piece given
